trans-unit.source: The Deferred API is based on the concept of promises that provide a generic interface into the eventual completion of an asynchronous action. The motivation for promises fundamentally is about creating a separation of concerns that allows one to achieve the same type of call patterns and logical data flow in asynchronous code as can be achieved in synchronous code. Promises allows one to be able to call a function purely with arguments needed for execution, without conflating the call with concerns of whether it is sync or async. One shouldn't need to alter a call's arguments if the implementation switches from sync to async (or vice versa). By having async functions return promises, the concerns of making the call are separated from the concerns of asynchronous interaction (which are handled by the promise).
trans-unit.target: 延迟的API是基于承诺的概念,它提供了一个通用接口,可以进入异步操作的最终完成。承诺的动机从根本上讲是关于创建一个分离的关注点,允许人们在异步代码中实现与同步代码中相同类型的调用模式和逻辑数据流。承诺允许人们能够纯粹地调用一个函数,并提供执行所需的参数,而不将调用与关注它是同步还是异步混为一谈。如果实现从同步切换到异步(或者反之亦然),人们不应该需要改变调用的参数。通过让async函数返回承诺,进行调用的关注点与异步交互的关注点(由承诺处理)分开。

trans-unit.source: The close() method is intended for instructing the store to 'close' out any information associated with a particular request. In general, this API expects to receive as a parameter a request object returned from a fetch. It will then close out anything associated with that request, such as clearing any internal datastore caches and closing any 'open' connections. For some store implementations, this call may be a no-op.
trans-unit.target: close()方法用于指示存储 "关闭 "与特定请求相关的任何信息。一般来说,这个API希望收到一个从取回的请求对象作为参数,然后它将关闭与该请求相关的任何东西,比如清除任何内部数据存储缓存,关闭任何与该请求相关的信息。然后,它将关闭与该请求相关的任何信息,例如清除任何内部数据存储缓存和关闭任何 "开放 "连接。对于一些存储实现来说,这个调用可能是一个不可能的操作。

trans-unit.source: The creator of the Deferred may specify a canceller. The canceller is a function that will be called if Deferred.cancel is called before the Deferred fires. You can use this to implement clean aborting of an XMLHttpRequest, etc. Note that cancel will fire the deferred with a CancelledError (unless your canceller returns another kind of error), so the errbacks should be prepared to handle that error for cancellable Deferreds.
trans-unit.target: Deferred的创建者可以指定一个canceller。这个canceller是一个函数,如果Deferred.cancel在Deferred开火前被调用,那么这个函数就会被调用。你可以用它来实现XMLHttpRequest的干净中止等。请注意,cancel会用一个CancelledError来发射deferred(除非你的canceller返回另一种错误),所以errbacks应该准备好为可取消的Deferreds处理这个错误。

trans-unit.source: The first time that addOnWindowUnload is called Dojo will register a page listener to trigger your unload handler with. Note that registering these handlers may destroy "fastback" page caching in browsers that support it. Be careful trying to modify the DOM or access JavaScript properties during this phase of page unloading: they may not always be available. Consider addOnUnload() if you need to modify the DOM or do heavy JavaScript work since it fires at the equivalent of the page's "onbeforeunload" event.
trans-unit.target: 第一次调用addOnWindowUnload时,Dojo会注册一个页面监听器来触发你的卸载处理程序。请注意,注册这些处理程序可能会破坏支持 "fastback "页面缓存的浏览器。在页面卸载的这一阶段要小心修改DOM或访问JavaScript属性:它们可能并不总是可用的。如果你需要修改DOM或进行繁重的JavaScript工作,请考虑使用addOnUnload(),因为它在页面的 "onbeforeunload "事件时触发。

trans-unit.source: The getFeatures() method returns an simple keyword values object that specifies what interface features the datastore implements. A simple CsvStore may be read-only, and the only feature it implements will be the 'dojo/data/api/Read' interface, so the getFeatures() method will return an object like this one: {'dojo.data.api.Read': true}. A more sophisticated datastore might implement a variety of interface features, like 'dojo.data.api.Read', 'dojo/data/api/Write', 'dojo.data.api.Identity', and 'dojo/data/api/Attribution'.
trans-unit.target: getFeatures()方法会返回一个简单的关键字值对象,指定数据存储实现了哪些接口特性。一个简单的CsvStore可能是只读的,它实现的唯一特性就是'dojo/data/api/Read'接口,所以getFeatures()方法将返回一个类似这样的对象。{'dojo.data.api.Read':true}。一个更复杂的数据存储可能会实现多种接口特性,比如'dojo.data.api.Read'、'dojo/data/api/Write'、'dojo.data.api.Identity'和'dojo/data/api/Attribution'。

trans-unit.source: The query may be optional in some data store implementations. The dojo/data/api/Read API does not specify the syntax or semantics of the query itself -- each different data store implementation may have its own notion of what a query should look like. However, as of dojo 0.9, 1.0, and 1.1, all the provided datastores in dojo.data and dojox.data support an object structure query, where the object is a set of name/value parameters such as { attrFoo: valueBar, attrFoo1: valueBar1}. Most of the dijit widgets, such as ComboBox assume this to be the case when working with a datastore when they dynamically update the query. Therefore, for maximum compatibility with dijit widgets the recommended query parameter is a key/value object. That does not mean that the the datastore may not take alternative query forms, such as a simple string, a Date, a number, or a mix of such. Ultimately, The dojo/data/api/Read API is agnostic about what the query format.
trans-unit.target: 在一些数据存储实现中,查询可能是可选的。dojo/data/api/Read API并没有指定查询本身的语法或语义--每个不同的数据存储实现可能有自己的查询概念。然而,从dojo 0.9、1.0和1.1开始,dojo.data和dojox.data中提供的所有数据存储都支持对象结构查询,其中对象是一组名称/值参数,如{attrFoo:valueBar,attrFoo1:valueBar1}。大多数的dijit部件,如ComboBox在动态更新查询时,都会假设这是与数据存储一起工作时的情况。因此,为了最大限度的兼容dijit widgets,推荐的查询参数是一个key/value对象。这并不意味着数据存储不能采取其他的查询形式,比如一个简单的字符串,一个Date,一个数字,或者这样的混合。最终,dojo/data/api/Read API对查询格式是不可知的。

It currently defines two options that all datastores should attempt to honor if possible:
trans-unit.target: queryOptions参数是一个可选的参数,用于指定可能以某种方式修改查询的选项,例如进行不区分大小写的搜索,或者进行深度搜索,在搜索中扫描数据的分层表示中的所有项目,而不仅仅是根项目。目前,它定义了两个选项,所有的数据存储都应该尽可能地尊重这两个选项。

trans-unit.source: The simpleFetch mixin is designed to serve as a set of function(s) that can be mixed into other datastore implementations to accelerate their development.
trans-unit.target: simpleFetch mixin被设计为一组函数,可以混合到其他数据存储实现中,以加速其开发。

trans-unit.source: The simpleFetch mixin should work well for any datastore that can respond to a _fetchItems() call by returning an array of all the found items that matched the query. The simpleFetch mixin is not designed to work for datastores that respond to a fetch() call by incrementally loading items, or sequentially loading partial batches of the result set. For datastores that mixin simpleFetch, simpleFetch implements a fetch method that automatically handles eight of the fetch() arguments -- onBegin, onItem, onComplete, onError, start, count, sort and scope The class mixing in simpleFetch should not implement fetch(), but should instead implement a _fetchItems() method. The _fetchItems() method takes three arguments, the keywordArgs object that was passed to fetch(), a callback function to be called when the result array is available, and an error callback to be called if something goes wrong. The _fetchItems() method should ignore any keywordArgs parameters for start, count, onBegin, onItem, onComplete, onError, sort, and scope. The _fetchItems() method needs to correctly handle any other keywordArgs parameters, including the query parameter and any optional parameters (such as includeChildren). The _fetchItems() method should create an array of result items and pass it to the fetchHandler along with the original request object -- or, the _fetchItems() method may, if it wants to, create an new request object with other specifics about the request that are specific to the datastore and pass that as the request object to the handler.
trans-unit.target: simpleFetch mixin可以很好地用于任何可以响应_fetchItems()调用的数据存储,它可以返回一个包含所有符合查询的找到的项目的数组。simpleFetch mixin不是为了响应fetch()调用的数据存储而设计的,这些数据存储通过增量加载项目,或按顺序加载结果集的部分批次。对于混入simpleFetch的数据存储,simpleFetch实现了一个fetch方法,该方法会自动处理fetch()参数中的8个参数--onBegin、onItem、onComplete、onError、start、count、sort和scope在simpleFetch中混入的类不应该实现fetch(),而应该实现一个_fetchItems()方法。_fetchItems()方法需要三个参数,分别是传递给fetch()的关键字Args对象,一个在结果数组可用时调用的回调函数,以及一个在出错时调用的错误回调。_fetchItems()方法应该忽略start、count、onBegin、onItem、onComplete、onError、sort和scope的任何keywordArgs参数。_fetchItems()方法需要正确处理任何其他关键字Args参数,包括查询参数和任何可选参数(如includeChildren)。_fetchItems()方法应该创建一个结果项的数组,并将其与原始请求对象一起传递给fetchHandler--或者,_fetchItems()方法可以根据自己的需要,创建一个新的请求对象,其中包含有关请求的其他特定于数据存储的细节,并将其作为请求对象传递给处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The sort function creation will look for a property on the store called 'comparatorMap'. If it exists it will look in the mapping for comparisons function for the attributes. If one is found, it will use it instead of the basic comparator, which is typically used for strings, ints, booleans, and dates. Returns the sorting function for this particular list of attributes and sorting directions.
trans-unit.target: 排序函数的创建将在商店中寻找一个名为'comparatorMap'的属性,如果它存在,它将在映射中寻找属性的比较函数。如果它存在,它将在映射中寻找属性的比较函数。如果找到了,它将使用它来代替基本比较器,基本比较器通常用于字符串、ints、booleans和日期。返回这个特定属性列表的排序函数和排序方向。

trans-unit.source: There are problems with using dojo/back with semantically-named fragment identifiers ("hash values" on an URL). In most browsers it will be hard for dojo/back to know distinguish a back from a forward event in those cases. For back/forward support to work best, the fragment ID should always be a unique value (something using new Date().getTime() for example). If you want to detect hash changes using semantic fragment IDs, then consider using dojo/hash instead (in Dojo 1.4+).
trans-unit.target: 使用带有语义命名的片段标识符（URL上的“哈希值”）的dojo / back存在问题。在大多数浏览器中，在这种情况下，dojo / back很难知道将前向事件与后向事件区分开。为了使后向/前向支持最佳发挥作用，片段ID应当始终为唯一值（例如，使用new Date（）。getTime（）的值）。如果要使用语义片段ID检测哈希更改，请考虑改为使用dojo / hash（在Dojo 1.4+中）。

trans-unit.source: There are problems with using dojo/back with semantically-named fragment identifiers ("hash values" on an URL). In most browsers it will be hard for dojo/back to know distinguish a back from a forward event in those cases. For back/forward support to work best, the fragment ID should always be a unique value (something using new Date().getTime() for example). If you want to detect hash changes using semantic fragment IDs, then consider using dojo/hash instead (in Dojo 1.4+).
trans-unit.target: 使用带有语义命名的片段标识符（URL上的“哈希值”）的dojo / back存在问题。在大多数浏览器中，在这种情况下，dojo / back很难知道将前向事件与后向事件区分开。为了使后向/前向支持最佳发挥作用，片段ID应当始终为唯一值（例如，使用new Date（）。getTime（）的值）。如果要使用语义片段ID检测哈希更改，请考虑改为使用dojo / hash（在Dojo 1.4+中）。

trans-unit.source: This API defines a set of APIs that all datastores that conform to the Notifications API must implement. In general, most stores will implement these APIs as no-op functions for users who wish to monitor them to be able to connect to then via dojo.connect(). For non-users of dojo.connect, they should be able to just replace the function on the store to obtain notifications. Both read-only and read-write stores may implement this feature. In the case of a read-only store, this feature makes sense if the store itself does internal polling to a back-end server and periodically updates its cache of items (deletes, adds, and updates).
trans-unit.target: 这个API定义了一组API,所有符合Notifications API的数据存储都必须实现。一般来说,大多数存储会将这些API实现为无操作函数,让希望监控它们的用户能够通过dojo.connect()连接到那时。对于dojo.connect的非用户来说,他们应该可以只替换商店上的函数来获取通知。只读和读写商店都可以实现这个功能。在只读存储的情况下,如果存储本身对后端服务器进行内部轮询,并定期更新其项目的缓存(删除、添加和更新),那么这个功能是有意义的。

trans-unit.source: This allows an app to setup a single event handler on a high level node, rather than many event handlers on subnodes. For example, one onclick handler for a Tree widget, rather than separate handlers for each node in the tree. Since setting up many event handlers is expensive, this can increase performance.
trans-unit.target: 这允许应用程序在高层节点上设置一个单一的事件处理程序,而不是在子节点上设置许多事件处理程序。例如,为Tree widget设置一个onclick处理程序,而不是为树上的每个节点设置单独的处理程序。由于设置许多事件处理程序的成本很高,这可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to mark a function, file, or module as experimental. Experimental code is not ready to be used, and the APIs are subject to change without notice. Experimental code may be completed deleted without going through the normal deprecation process.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用来标记一个函数、文件或模块为实验性代码。实验性代码还没有准备好使用,而且API可能会在没有通知的情况下进行更改。实验性代码可以在不经过正常的废弃过程的情况下完成删除。

trans-unit.source: This class defines out the semantics of what a 'Request' object looks like when returned from a fetch() method. In general, a request object is nothing more than the original keywordArgs from fetch with an abort function attached to it to allow users to abort a particular request if they so choose. No other functions are required on a general Request object return. That does not inhibit other store implementations from adding extensions to it, of course.
trans-unit.target: 这个类定义了从fetch()方法返回的'Request'对象的语义。一般来说,一个Request对象只不过是fetch中的关键字Args,并附加了一个中止函数,允许用户在选择时中止一个特定的请求。一般的Request对象返回时不需要其他函数。当然,这并不妨碍其他存储实现对它进行添加扩展。

trans-unit.source: This function acts the same as on(), but will only call the listener once. The listener will be called for the first event that takes place and then listener will automatically be removed.

trans-unit.source: This function acts the same as on(), but with pausable functionality. The returned signal object has pause() and resume() functions. Calling the pause() method will cause the listener to not be called for future events. Calling the resume() method will cause the listener to again be called for future events.
trans-unit.target: 该函数的作用与on()相同,但具有可暂停功能。返回的信号对象有暂停()和恢复()函数。调用pause()方法将使监听器在未来的事件中不被调用。调用resume()方法将使监听器再次被调用以应对未来的事件。

trans-unit.source: This function corresponds to the JavaScript 1.6 Array.every() method, with one difference: when run over sparse arrays, this implementation passes the "holes" in the sparse array to the callback function with a value of undefined. JavaScript 1.6's every skips the holes in the sparse array. For more details, see: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Core_JavaScript_1.5_Reference/Objects/Array/every
trans-unit.target: 此函数对应于JavaScript 1.6 Array.every（）方法，但有一个区别：在稀疏数组上运行时，此实现将稀疏数组中的“空洞”传递给值为未定义的回调函数。JavaScript 1.6会跳过稀疏数组中的漏洞。有关更多详细信息，请参见：https : //developer.mozilla.org/en/Core_JavaScript_1.5_Reference/Objects/Array/every

trans-unit.source: This function corresponds to the JavaScript 1.6 Array.filter() method, with one difference: when run over sparse arrays, this implementation passes the "holes" in the sparse array to the callback function with a value of undefined. JavaScript 1.6's filter skips the holes in the sparse array. For more details, see: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Core_JavaScript_1.5_Reference/Objects/Array/filter
trans-unit.target: 此函数对应于JavaScript 1.6 Array.filter（）方法，但有一个区别：在稀疏数组上运行时，此实现将稀疏数组中的“空洞”传递给值为未定义的回调函数。 JavaScript 1.6的过滤器会跳过稀疏数组中的漏洞。有关更多详细信息，请参见：https : //developer.mozilla.org/en/Core_JavaScript_1.5_Reference/Objects/Array/filter

trans-unit.source: This function corresponds to the JavaScript 1.6 Array.forEach() method, with one difference: when run over sparse arrays, this implementation passes the "holes" in the sparse array to the callback function with a value of undefined. JavaScript 1.6's forEach skips the holes in the sparse array. For more details, see: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Core_JavaScript_1.5_Reference/Objects/Array/forEach
trans-unit.target: 此函数对应于JavaScript 1.6 Array.forEach（）方法，但有一个区别：在稀疏数组上运行时，此实现将稀疏数组中的“空洞”传递给值为未定义的回调函数。 JavaScript 1.6的forEach跳过了稀疏数组中的漏洞。有关更多详细信息，请参见：https : //developer.mozilla.org/en/Core_JavaScript_1.5_Reference/Objects/Array/forEach

trans-unit.source: This function corresponds to the JavaScript 1.6 Array.map() method, with one difference: when run over sparse arrays, this implementation passes the "holes" in the sparse array to the callback function with a value of undefined. JavaScript 1.6's map skips the holes in the sparse array. For more details, see: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Core_JavaScript_1.5_Reference/Objects/Array/map
trans-unit.target: 此函数对应于JavaScript 1.6 Array.map（）方法，但有一个区别：在稀疏数组上运行时，此实现将稀疏数组中的“空洞”传递给值为未定义的回调函数。JavaScript 1.6的映射跳过了稀疏数组中的漏洞。有关更多详细信息，请参见：https : //developer.mozilla.org/en/Core_JavaScript_1.5_Reference/Objects/Array/map

trans-unit.source: This function corresponds to the JavaScript 1.6 Array.some() method, with one difference: when run over sparse arrays, this implementation passes the "holes" in the sparse array to the callback function with a value of undefined. JavaScript 1.6's some skips the holes in the sparse array. For more details, see: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Core_JavaScript_1.5_Reference/Objects/Array/some
trans-unit.target: 此函数对应于JavaScript 1.6 Array.some（）方法，但有一个区别：在稀疏数组上运行时，此实现将稀疏数组中的“空洞”传递给值为未定义的回调函数。JavaScript 1.6的某些功能可以跳过稀疏数组中的漏洞。有关更多详细信息，请参见：https : //developer.mozilla.org/en/Core_JavaScript_1.5_Reference/Objects/Array/some

trans-unit.source: This function follows native JSON API Throws for invalid JSON strings. This delegates to eval() if native JSON support is not available. By default this will evaluate any valid JS expression. With the strict parameter set to true, the parser will ensure that only valid JSON strings are parsed (otherwise throwing an error). Without the strict parameter, the content passed to this method must come from a trusted source.
trans-unit.target: 此函数遵循针对无效JSON字符串的本机JSON API抛出。如果没有本地JSON支持，则将其委托给eval（）。默认情况下，它将评估任何有效的JS表达式。将strict参数设置为true时，解析器将确保仅解析有效的JSON字符串（否则引发错误）。没有严格的参数，传递给此方法的内容必须来自受信任的来源。

trans-unit.source: This function is a hook point for stores to provide as a way for a fetch to be halted mid-processing.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数是为存储提供的一个钩子点,作为在处理过程中停止获取的方式。

trans-unit.source: This function is a hook point for stores to provide as a way for a fetch to be halted mid-processing. For more details on the fetch() api, please see dojo/data/api/Read.fetch().
trans-unit.target: 此功能是商店的一个挂钩点，可作为中途停止获取的方式。有关fetch（）api的更多详细信息，请参阅dojo / data / api / Read.fetch（）。

trans-unit.source: This function is called any time a new item is created in the store. It is called immediately after the store newItem processing has completed.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在商店中创建一个新项目时被调用。它在商店newItem处理完成后立即被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called any time an item is deleted from the store. It is called immediately after the store deleteItem processing has completed.
trans-unit.target: 当一个物品从商店中被删除时,这个函数会被调用。它在商店deleteItem处理完成后立即被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is called any time an item is modified via setValue, setValues, unsetAttribute, etc.
trans-unit.target: 在通过setValue、setValues、unsetAttribute等修改一个项目时,都会调用这个函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is called any time an item is modified via setValue, setValues, unsetAttribute, etc. Its purpose is to provide a hook point for those who wish to monitor actions on items in the store in a simple manner. The general expected usage is to dojo.connect() to the store's implementation and be called after the store function is called.
trans-unit.target: 在通过setValue、setValues、unsetAttribute等修改一个项目时,都会调用这个函数。它的目的是为那些希望以简单的方式监控store中的项目动作的人提供一个钩子点。一般预期的用法是将dojo.connect()连接到store的实现中,并在调用store函数后被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function is used to implement extend() method of a constructor produced with declare().
trans-unit.target: 这个函数用于实现用declar()产生的构造函数的extension()方法。

trans-unit.source: This function is used to mix in properties like lang.mixin does, but it skips a constructor property and decorates functions like declare() does.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数像lang.mixin那样用来混入属性,但它跳过了构造函数属性,并像declar()那样装饰函数。

trans-unit.source: This function will be called at the end of every request, whether or not an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数将在每次请求结束时被调用,无论是否发生错误。

trans-unit.source: This function will be called on a successful HTTP response code.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数将在HTTP响应代码成功时被调用。

trans-unit.source: This function will be called when the request fails due to a network or server error, the url is invalid, etc. It will also be called if the load or handle callback throws an exception, unless djConfig.debugAtAllCosts is true. This allows deployed applications to continue to run even when a logic error happens in the callback, while making it easier to troubleshoot while in debug mode.
trans-unit.target: 当由于网络或服务器错误,url无效等原因导致请求失败时,这个函数将被调用。除非djConfig.debugAtAllCosts为true,否则当加载或处理回调抛出异常时,该函数也会被调用。这使得部署的应用程序即使在回调中发生逻辑错误时也能继续运行,同时使其在调试模式下更容易排除故障。

trans-unit.source: This function will return a new promise that is fulfilled when the given fulfilledHandler or errorHandler callback is finished. This allows promise operations to be chained together. The value returned from the callback handler is the fulfillment value for the returned promise. If the callback throws an error, the returned promise will be moved to failed state.
trans-unit.target: 该函数将返回一个新的承诺,当给定的 fulfilledHandler 或 errorHandler 回调完成后,该承诺将被履行。这允许将承诺操作链在一起。回调处理程序返回的值是返回的承诺的履行值。如果回调抛出一个错误,返回的承诺将被移到失败状态。

trans-unit.source: This getValues() method works just like the getValue() method, but getValues() always returns an array rather than a single attribute value. The array may be empty, may contain a single attribute value, or may contain many attribute values. If the item does not have a value for the given attribute, then getValues() will return an empty array: []. (So, if store.hasAttribute(item, attribute) has a return of false, then store.getValues(item, attribute) will return [].)
trans-unit.target: 这个getValues()方法的工作原理和getValue()方法一样,但是getValues()总是返回一个数组,而不是单个属性值。数组可能是空的,可能包含一个属性值,也可能包含许多属性值。如果项目没有给定属性的值,那么getValues()将返回一个空数组。[].(所以,如果store.hasAttribute(item,attribute)的返回值为false,那么store.getValues(item,attribute)将返回[]。)

trans-unit.source: This indicates the following rollup modules are available:
trans-unit.target: 这表明以下滚动模块是可用的。

trans-unit.source: This indicates whether or not to include object updates that do not affect the inclusion or order of the object in the query results. By default this is false, which means that if any object is updated in such a way that it remains in the result set and it's position in result sets is not affected, then the listener will not be fired.
trans-unit.target: 这表示是否包含不影响对象在查询结果中的包含或顺序的对象更新。默认情况下这是false,这意味着如果任何对象的更新方式使它仍然在结果集中,并且它在结果集中的位置不受影响,那么监听器将不会被启动。

trans-unit.source: This is a basic in-memory object store. It implements dojo/store/api/Store.

trans-unit.source: This is a basic store for RESTful communicating with a server through JSON formatted data. It implements dojo/store/api/Store.
trans-unit.target: 这是用于通过JSON格式的数据与服务器进行RESTful通信的基本存储。它实现了dojo / store / api / Store。

trans-unit.source: This is a list of IO topics that can be published if djConfig.ioPublish is set to true. IO topics can be published for any Input/Output, network operation. So, dojo.xhr, dojo.io.script and dojo.io.iframe can all trigger these topics to be published.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个IO主题的列表,如果djConfig.ioPublish被设置为true,则可以发布这些主题。IO主题可以为任何输入/输出、网络操作发布。所以,dojo.xhr、dojo.io.script和dojo.io.iframe都可以触发这些主题的发布。

trans-unit.source: This is a small implementation of the Boodman/Crockford delegation pattern in JavaScript. An intermediate object constructor mediates the prototype chain for the returned object, using it to delegate down to obj for property lookup when object-local lookup fails. This can be thought of similarly to ES4's "wrap", save that it does not act on types but rather on pure objects.
trans-unit.target: 这是JavaScript中Boodman/Crockford委托模式的一个小实现。一个中间对象构造函数为返回对象的原型链做中介,当对象本地查找失败时,使用它向下委托obj进行属性查找。这可以被认为类似于ES4的 "wrap",只不过它不是作用于类型,而是作用于纯对象。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract API that data provider implementations conform to. This file defines function signatures and intentionally leaves all the functions unimplemented.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象的API,数据提供者的实现要符合这个API。这个文件定义了函数签名,并有意让所有的函数不被实现。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract API that data provider implementations conform to. This file defines functions signatures and intentionally leaves all the functions unimplemented.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象的API,数据提供者的实现要符合这个API。这个文件定义了函数签名,并故意不实现所有的函数。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract API that data provider implementations conform to. This file defines methods signatures and intentionally leaves all the methods unimplemented.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象的API,数据提供者的实现要符合这个API。这个文件定义了方法签名,并故意不实现所有的方法。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract API that data provider implementations conform to. This file defines methods signatures and intentionally leaves all the methods unimplemented. For more information on the , please visit: http://dojotoolkit.org/reference-guide/dojo/store.html Every method and property is optional, and is only needed if the functionality it provides is required. Every method may return a promise for the specified return value if the execution of the operation is asynchronous (except for query() which already defines an async return value).
trans-unit.target: 这是数据提供程序实现所遵循的抽象API。该文件定义方法签名，并有意保留所有未实现的方法。有关的更多信息，请访问：http : //dojotoolkit.org/reference-guide/dojo/store.html每个方法和属性都是可选的，并且仅在需要其提供的功能时才需要。如果该操作的执行是异步的（除了已经定义了异步返回值的query（）），则每个方法都可以为指定的返回值返回承诺。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract API that data provider implementations conform to. This file defines methods signatures and intentionally leaves all the methods unimplemented. For more information on the , please visit: http://dojotoolkit.org/reference-guide/dojo/store.html Every method and property is optional, and is only needed if the functionality it provides is required. Every method may return a promise for the specified return value if the execution of the operation is asynchronous (except for query() which already defines an async return value).

This is an abstract API that data provider implementations conform to. This file defines methods signatures and intentionally leaves all the methods unimplemented. For more information on the dojo.data APIs, please visit: http://www.dojotoolkit.org/node/98

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract API that data provider implementations conform to. This file defines methods signatures and intentionally leaves all the methods unimplemented. For more information on the dojo.data APIs, please visit: http://www.dojotoolkit.org/node/98
This is an adapter for using Dojo Data stores with an object store consumer. You can provide a Dojo data store and use this adapter to interact with it through the Dojo object store API
trans-unit.target: 这是一个用于使用Dojo数据存储与对象存储消费者的适配器。您可以提供一个Dojo数据存储,并使用该适配器通过Dojo对象存储API与之交互。

trans-unit.source: This is an extension event for the mouseenter that IE provides, emulating the behavior on other browsers.
trans-unit.target: 这是IE提供的鼠标输入的扩展事件,模仿其他浏览器的行为。

trans-unit.source: This is an extension event for the mouseleave that IE provides, emulating the behavior on other browsers.
trans-unit.target: 这是IE提供的鼠标离开的扩展事件,模仿其他浏览器的行为。

trans-unit.source: This is an extension event for the mousewheel that non-Mozilla browsers provide, emulating the behavior on Mozilla based browsers.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个非Mozilla浏览器提供的鼠标滚轮的扩展事件,模拟基于Mozilla浏览器的行为。

trans-unit.source: This is an object returned from query() calls that provides access to the results of a query. Queries may be executed asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 这是由query()调用返回的对象,提供对查询结果的访问。查询可以异步执行。

trans-unit.source: This is an object returned from transaction() calls that represents the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个从transaction()调用中返回的对象,代表当前事务。

trans-unit.source: This is called if the query failed, and is passed a single argument that is the error for the failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果查询失败,则调用该函数,并传递一个单一参数,即失败的错误。

trans-unit.source: This is called when the query is completed successfully, and is passed a single argument that is an array representing the query results.
trans-unit.target: 当查询成功完成时,会调用这个函数,并传递一个参数,这个参数是代表查询结果的数组。

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to calling set(foo, "Howdy") and set(bar, 3)
trans-unit.target: 这相当于调用set(foo,"Howdy")和set(bar,3)

trans-unit.source: This is function to be called after the original method
trans-unit.target: 这是在原方法之后调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: This is function to be called around the original method
trans-unit.target: 这是在原方法周围调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: This is function to be called before the original method
trans-unit.target: 这是在原方法之前要调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: This is the authoritative store, all uncached requests or non-safe requests will be made against this store.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个权威的存储,所有未缓存的请求或非安全请求都将针对这个存储进行。

trans-unit.source: This is the caching store that will be used to store responses for quick access. Typically this should be a local store.
trans-unit.target: 这是将用于存储响应以便快速访问的缓存存储。通常这应该是一个本地存储。

trans-unit.source: This is the function that should be called when the event fires.
trans-unit.target: 这是事件发生时应该被调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: This is the name of the event to listen for or an extension event type.
trans-unit.target: 这是要监听的事件名称或扩展事件类型。

trans-unit.source: This is the name of the method to attach to.
trans-unit.target: 这是要附加到的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: This is the target object
trans-unit.target: 这是目标对象

trans-unit.source: This is the target object or DOM element that to receive events from
trans-unit.target: 这是要接收事件的目标对象或DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: This method behaves exactly like the Array.concat method with the caveat that it returns a NodeList and not a raw Array. For more details, see the Array.concat docs
trans-unit.target: 此方法的行为与Array.concat方法完全一样，但要注意的是它返回 NodeList 而不是原始Array。有关更多详细信息，请参见Array.concat文档

trans-unit.source: This method behaves exactly like the Array.slice method with the caveat that it returns a dojo/NodeList and not a raw Array. For more details, see Mozilla's slice documentation
trans-unit.target: 此方法的行为与Array.slice方法完全一样，但要注意的是，它返回dojo / NodeList而不是原始Array。有关更多详细信息，请参见Mozilla的slice文档

trans-unit.source: This method behaves exactly like the Array.splice method with the caveat that it returns a dojo/NodeList and not a raw Array. For more details, see Mozilla's splice documentation For backwards compatibility, calling .end() on the spliced NodeList does not return the original NodeList -- splice alters the NodeList in place.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的行为与Array.splice方法完全一样，但要注意的是，它返回dojo / NodeList而不是原始Array。有关更多详细信息，请参见Mozilla的接头文档。为了向后兼容，在已拼接的NodeList上调用.end（）不会返回原始的NodeList －拼接会在适当的位置更改NodeList。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot me called from automatically chained constructors including the case of a special (legacy) constructor chaining. It cannot be called from chained methods.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法不能从自动链式构造函数中调用,包括特殊(传统)构造函数链式的情况。不能从链式方法中调用。

trans-unit.source: This method corresponds to the JavaScript 1.6 Array.indexOf method, with two differences:
trans-unit.target: 这个方法对应于JavaScript 1.6的Array.indexOf方法,有两个不同之处。

trans-unit.source: This method corresponds to the JavaScript 1.6 Array.lastIndexOf method, with two differences:
trans-unit.target: 这个方法对应于JavaScript 1.6的Array.lastIndexOf方法,有两点不同。

trans-unit.source: This method handles the basic filtering needs for ItemFile* based stores.
trans-unit.target: 本方法处理基于ItemFile*的商店的基本过滤需求。

trans-unit.source: This method is a convenience method for "this.inherited()". It uses the same algorithm but instead of executing a super method, it returns it, or "undefined" if not found.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是 "this.inherited()"的一个方便方法,它使用同样的算法,但不是执行一个超级方法,而是返回它,如果没有找到,则返回 "undefined"。它使用相同的算法,但不是执行一个超级方法,而是返回它,如果没有找到,则返回 "undefined"。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to dojo.extend function, but it is specific to constructors produced by declare(). It is implemented using dojo.safeMixin, and it skips a constructor property, and properly decorates copied functions.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法类似于dojo.extension函数,但它是针对由declare()产生的构造函数的,它使用dojo.safeMixin实现,并跳过构造函数的属性,适当装饰复制的函数。它使用dojo.safeMixin实现,它跳过了一个构造函数属性,并正确地装饰了复制的函数。

trans-unit.source: This method is simpler than the dojo/NodeList.html() method provided by dojo/NodeList-html. This method just does proper innerHTML insertion of HTML fragments, and it allows for the innerHTML to be read for the first node in the node list. Since dojo/NodeList-html already took the "html" name, this method is called "innerHTML". However, if dojo/NodeList-html has not been loaded yet, this module will define an "html" method that can be used instead. Be careful if you are working in an environment where it is possible that dojo/NodeList-html could have been loaded, since its definition of "html" will take precedence. The nodes represented by the value argument will be cloned if more than one node is in this NodeList. The nodes in this NodeList are returned in the "set" usage of this method, not the HTML that was inserted.
trans-unit.target: 该方法比dojo / NodeList-html提供的dojo / NodeList.html（）方法更简单。此方法只是正确地将HTML片段插入了innerHTML，并且允许为节点列表中的第一个节点读取innerHTML。由于dojo / NodeList-html已采用“ html”名称，因此此方法称为“ innerHTML”。但是，如果尚未加载dojo / NodeList-html，则此模块将定义可替代使用的“ html”方法。如果您在可能使用dojo / NodeList-html的环境中工作，请小心可能已加载，因为其对“ html”的定义将优先。如果此NodeList中有多个节点，则将克隆value参数表示的节点。使用此方法的“设置”用法返回此NodeList中的节点，而不是插入的HTML。

trans-unit.source: This method is used inside method of classes produced with declare() to call a super method (next in the chain). It is used for manually controlled chaining. Consider using the regular chaining, because it is faster. Use "this.inherited()" only in complex cases.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法用于在用declar()产生的类的方法中调用一个超级方法(链中的下一个)。它用于手动控制链。考虑使用常规链,因为它更快。只有在复杂的情况下才使用 "this.inherited()"。

trans-unit.source: This method is used with instances of classes produced with declare() to determine of they support a certain interface or not. It models "instanceof" operator.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法用于声明()产生的类的实例,以确定它们是否支持某个接口。它模拟了 "instanceof "操作符。

trans-unit.source: This method must be called to activate the router. Until startup is called, no hash changes will trigger route callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法必须被调用来激活路由器。在调用启动之前,任何哈希变化都不会触发路由回调。

trans-unit.source: This method takes a "map" of arrays which one can use to optionally load dojo modules. The map is indexed by the possible dojo.name values, with two additional values: "default" and "common". The items in the "default" array will be loaded if none of the other items have been chosen based on dojo.name, set by your host environment. The items in the "common" array will always be loaded, regardless of which list is chosen.
trans-unit.target: 此方法获取阵列的“映射”，可用于可选地加载dojo模块。该映射由可能的dojo.name 值索引，并带有两个附加值：“默认”和“公共”。如果没有根据主机环境设置的dojo.name选择其他项目，则将加载“默认”数组中的项目。无论选择哪个列表，“ common”数组中的项目将始终被加载。

trans-unit.source: This module causes the browser-only base modules to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 该模块会导致只加载浏览器的基础模块。

trans-unit.source: This module contains the document and window unload detection API. This module is deprecated. Use on(window, "unload", func) and on(window, "beforeunload", func) instead.
trans-unit.target: 该模块包含文档和窗口卸载检测API。该模块已被废弃。使用on(window,"unload",func)和on(window,"beforeunload",func)代替。

trans-unit.source: This module defines Javascript language extensions.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了Javascript语言扩展。

trans-unit.source: This module defines dojo DOM event API. Usually you should use dojo/on, and evt.stopPropagation() + evt.preventDefault(), rather than this module.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了dojo DOM事件API。通常，您应该使用dojo / on和evt.stopPropagation（）+ evt.preventDefault（），而不是此模块。

trans-unit.source: This module defines form-processing functions.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了表单处理功能。

trans-unit.source: This module defines query string processing functions.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了查询字符串处理功能。

trans-unit.source: This module defines the base dojo/_base/fx implementation.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了基本的dojo / _base / fx实现。

trans-unit.source: This module defines the core dojo DOM API.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了核心的dojo DOM API。

trans-unit.source: This module defines the core dojo DOM class API.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了dojo DOM类的核心API。

trans-unit.source: This module defines the core dojo DOM geometry API.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了核心的dojo DOM几何API。

trans-unit.source: This module defines the core dojo DOM style API.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了核心的dojo DOM风格API。

trans-unit.source: This module defines the dojo JSON API.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了dojo JSON API。

trans-unit.source: This module defines the dojo.connect API. This modules also provides keyboard event handling helpers. This module exports an extension event for emulating Firefox's keypress handling. However, this extension event exists primarily for backwards compatibility and is not recommended. WebKit and IE uses an alternate keypress handling (only firing for printable characters, to distinguish from keydown events), and most consider the WebKit/IE behavior more desirable.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了dojo.connect API。该模块还提供了键盘事件处理助手。该模块导出了一个扩展事件,用于模拟Firefox的按键处理。然而,这个扩展事件的存在主要是为了向后兼容,不推荐使用。WebKit和IE使用了另一种按键处理方式(只对可打印字符开火,以区别于按键事件),大多数人认为WebKit/IE的行为更可取。

trans-unit.source: This module defines the user configuration during bootstrap.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了用户在引导过程中的配置。

trans-unit.source: This module extends dojo/NodeList with the legacy connect(), coords(), blur(), focus(), change(), click(), error(), keydown(), keypress(), keyup(), load(), mousedown(), mouseenter(), mouseleave(), mousemove(), mouseout(), mouseover(), mouseup(), and submit() methods.
trans-unit.target: 该模块使用传统的connect（），coords（），blur（），focus（），change（），click（），error（），keydown（），keypress（），keyup（），load 扩展dojo / NodeList。 （），mousedown（），mouseenter（），mouseleave（），mousemove（），mouseout（），mouseover（），mouseup（）和submit（）方法。

trans-unit.source: This module handles loading the appropriate selector engine for the given browser
trans-unit.target: 该模块处理为给定的浏览器加载适当的选择引擎。

trans-unit.source: This module implements the dojo/i18n! plugin and the v1.6- i18n API
trans-unit.target: 这个模块实现了dojo / i18n！插件和v1.6- i18n API

trans-unit.source: This module implements the dojo/i18n! plugin and the v1.6- i18n API
trans-unit.target: 这个模块实现了dojo / i18n！插件和v1.6- i18n API

trans-unit.source: This module implements the dojo/text! plugin and the dojo.cache API.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块实现了dojo / text！插件和dojo.cache API。

trans-unit.source: This module is a stub for the core dojo DOM API.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块是核心dojo DOM API的一个存根。

trans-unit.source: This module is the foundational module of the dojo boot sequence; it defines the dojo object.
trans-unit.target: 该模块是道场引导序列的基础模块,它定义了道场对象。

trans-unit.source: This module provide mouse event handling utility functions and exports mouseenter and mouseleave event emulation.
trans-unit.target: 本模块提供鼠标事件处理实用功能,并输出鼠标输入和鼠标离开事件仿真。

trans-unit.source: This module provides unified touch event handlers by exporting press, move, release and cancel which can also run well on desktop. Based on http://dvcs.w3.org/hg/webevents/raw-file/tip/touchevents.html Also, if the dojoClick property is set to truthy on a DOM node, dojo/touch generates click events immediately for this node and its descendants (except for descendants that have a dojoClick property set to falsy), to avoid the delay before native browser click events, and regardless of whether evt.preventDefault() was called in a touch.press event listener.
trans-unit.target: 该模块通过导出按，移动，释放和取消来提供统一的触摸事件处理程序，这些操作也可以在桌面上很好地运行。基于http://dvcs.w3.org/hg/webevents/raw-file/tip/touchevents.html而且，如果在DOM节点上将dojoClick属性设置为true，则dojo / touch会立即为此节点生成点击事件及其后代（将dojoClick属性设置为falsy的后代除外），以避免在本机浏览器单击事件之前延迟，并且无论是否在touch.press事件侦听器中调用了evt.preventDefault（）。

trans-unit.source: This module provides unified touch event handlers by exporting press, move, release and cancel which can also run well on desktop. Based on http://dvcs.w3.org/hg/webevents/raw-file/tip/touchevents.html Also, if the dojoClick property is set to truthy on a DOM node, dojo/touch generates click events immediately for this node and its descendants (except for descendants that have a dojoClick property set to falsy), to avoid the delay before native browser click events, and regardless of whether evt.preventDefault() was called in a touch.press event listener.
trans-unit.target: 该模块通过导出按，移动，释放和取消来提供统一的触摸事件处理程序，这些操作也可以在桌面上很好地运行。基于http://dvcs.w3.org/hg/webevents/raw-file/tip/touchevents.html而且，如果在DOM节点上将dojoClick属性设置为true，则dojo / touch会立即为此节点生成点击事件及其后代（将dojoClick属性设置为falsy的后代除外），以避免在本机浏览器单击事件之前延迟，并且无论是否在touch.press事件侦听器中调用了evt.preventDefault（）。

trans-unit.source: This module provides unified touch event handlers by exporting press, move, release and cancel which can also run well on desktop. Based on http://dvcs.w3.org/hg/webevents/raw-file/tip/touchevents.html Also, if the dojoClick property is set to truthy on a DOM node, dojo/touch generates click events immediately for this node and its descendants (except for descendants that have a dojoClick property set to falsy), to avoid the delay before native browser click events, and regardless of whether evt.preventDefault() was called in a touch.press event listener.

This module provides unified touch event handlers by exporting press, move, release and cancel which can also run well on desktop. Based on http://dvcs.w3.org/hg/webevents/raw-file/tip/touchevents.html Also, if the dojoClick property is set to truthy on a DOM node, dojo/touch generates click events immediately for this node and its descendants (except for descendants that have a dojoClick property set to falsy), to avoid the delay before native browser click events, and regardless of whether evt.preventDefault() was called in a touch.press event listener.
This module sets has() flags based on the current browser. It returns the has() function.
trans-unit.target: 该模块根据当前浏览器设置has()标志。它返回has()函数。

trans-unit.source: This modules defines dojo/date/locale, localization methods for Date.
trans-unit.target: 该模块定义了dojo / date / locale，Date的本地化方法。

trans-unit.source: This modules provides DOM querying functionality. The module export is a function that can be used to query for DOM nodes by CSS selector and returns a NodeList representing the matching nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该模块提供DOM查询功能。模块导出是一个函数,可以通过CSS选择器查询DOM节点,并返回一个代表匹配节点的NodeList。

trans-unit.source: This node will be replaced/attached to by the widget. It also specifies the arguments to pass to ctor.
trans-unit.target: 这个节点将被小组件替换/连接到。它还指定了要传递给 ctor 的参数。

trans-unit.source: This option is ignored. All requests using this transport are GET requests.
trans-unit.target: 这个选项会被忽略。所有使用该传输的请求都是GET请求。

trans-unit.source: This parameter accepts computed styles object. If this parameter is omitted, the functions will call dojo/dom-style.getComputedStyle to get one. It is a better way, calling dojo/dom-style.getComputedStyle once, and then pass the reference to this computedStyle parameter. Wherever possible, reuse the returned object of dojo/dom-style.getComputedStyle().
trans-unit.target: 这个参数接受计算后的样式对象,如果省略这个参数,函数将调用dojo/dom-style.getComputedStyle来获取一个。如果省略了这个参数,函数将调用dojo/dom-style.getComputedStyle来获取一个对象。更好的方法是调用dojo/dom-style.getComputedStyle一次,然后将引用传递给这个computedStyle参数。只要有可能,就重用dojo/dom-style.getComputedStyle()的返回对象。

trans-unit.source: Using a Deferred doesn't simplify the sending code any, but it provides a standard interface for callers and senders alike, providing both with a simple way to service multiple callbacks for an operation and freeing both sides from worrying about details such as "did this get called already?". With Deferreds, new callbacks can be added at any time.
trans-unit.target: 使用Defererred并没有简化发送代码,但它为调用者和发送者都提供了一个标准的接口,为双方提供了一个简单的方法来服务一个操作的多个回调,使双方都不用担心 "这个已经被调用了吗?"等细节问题。通过Deferreds,可以随时添加新的回调。

trans-unit.source: We choose to include our own plugin to leverage functionality already contained in dojo and thereby reduce the size of the plugin compared to various foreign loader implementations. Also, this allows foreign AMD loaders to be used without their plugins.
trans-unit.target: 我们选择加入自己的插件,是为了利用dojo中已经包含的功能,从而与国外各种加载器实现相比,减少了插件的大小。同时,这也使得国外的AMD加载器可以在没有其插件的情况下使用。

When passing functions as values, note that they will not be directly assigned to slots on the node, but rather the default behavior will be removed and the new behavior will be added using dojo.connect(), meaning that event handler properties will be normalized and that some caveats with regards to non-standard behaviors for onsubmit apply. Namely that you should cancel form submission using dojo.stopEvent() on the passed event object instead of returning a boolean value from the handler itself.
trans-unit.target: 当将函数作为值传递时，请注意，它们不会直接分配给节点上的插槽，而是会删除默认行为，并使用 dojo.connect() 添加新行为，这意味着事件处理程序属性将被规范化并且关于onsubmit的非标准行为的一些警告适用。也就是说，您应该在传递的事件对象上使用 dojo.stopEvent() 取消表单提交，而不是从处理程序本身返回布尔值。

trans-unit.source: When setting up a connection, the event parameter must be a string that is the name of the method/event to be listened for. trans-unit.source: a DnD manager object
trans-unit.target: DnD管理对象

trans-unit.source: a Selector object, which knows how to select its children
trans-unit.target: 一个选择器对象,它知道如何选择它的子对象。

trans-unit.source: a Source object, which can be used as a DnD source, or a DnD target
trans-unit.target: Source对象,它可以作为DnD源,或DnD目标。

trans-unit.source: a String with special characters to be left unescaped
trans-unit.target: a 带有特殊字符的字符串,不加封存。

trans-unit.target: 一个目标对象,它可以作为DnD目标使用。

trans-unit.source: a cloned set of the original nodes.
trans-unit.target: 原始节点的克隆集。

trans-unit.source: a constructor of custom Mover
trans-unit.target: 自定义Mover的构造函数

trans-unit.source: a copy of the HTML content is added to each item in the list, with an optional position argument. If no position argument is provided, the content is appended to the end of each item.
trans-unit.target: HTML内容的副本被添加到列表中的每个项目中,并带有一个可选的位置参数。如果没有提供位置参数,则将内容添加到每个项目的末尾。

trans-unit.source: a creator function, which takes a data item, and returns an object like that: {node: newNode, data: usedData, type: arrayOfStrings}
trans-unit.target: 创造者函数,它接收一个数据项,并返回一个类似于这样的对象。{node:newNode,data:usedData,type:arrayOfStrings}。

trans-unit.source: a custom serializer for an objects of a particular class:
trans-unit.target: 一个特定类的对象的自定义序列器。

trans-unit.target: 参数字典

trans-unit.source: a function is invoked with three arguments, (item, index, array), and returns a value
trans-unit.target: 函数调用三个参数(item、index、array),并返回一个值。

trans-unit.source: a function is invoked with three arguments: item, index, and array and returns true if the condition is met.
trans-unit.target: 调用一个函数,有三个参数:item、index和array,如果满足条件则返回true。

trans-unit.source: a function that arguments are passed to from the adapter's match() function. The check function should return true if the given arguments are appropriate for the wrap function.
trans-unit.target: 一个函数,参数从适配器的match()函数传递到该函数。如果给定的参数适合wrap函数,检查函数应该返回true。

trans-unit.source: a function that is invoked with three arguments (item, index, array). The return of this function is expected to be a boolean which determines whether the passed-in item will be included in the returned array.
trans-unit.target: 一个有三个参数(item、index、array)的函数。这个函数的返回值应该是一个布尔值,它决定传入的项目是否会被包含在返回的数组中。

trans-unit.source: a function to process all parameters before substitution takes place, e.g. mylib.encodeXML
trans-unit.target: 在替换之前处理所有参数的函数,例如mylib.encodeXML。

trans-unit.source: a handler for mousemove and touchmove events, which scrolls the first available Dom element, it falls back to exports.autoScroll()
trans-unit.target: 鼠标移动和触摸移动事件的处理程序,滚动第一个可用的DOM元素,它又回到了exports.autoScroll()。

trans-unit.source: a handler for mousemove and touchmove events, which scrolls the window, if necessary
trans-unit.target: 处理鼠标移动和触摸移动事件,必要时滚动窗口。

trans-unit.source: a kwArgs options object, see parse() for details
trans-unit.target: kwArgs选项对象,详见parse()。

trans-unit.source: css2: If the browser has a native selector engine, this will be used, otherwise a very minimal lightweight selector engine will be loaded that can do simple CSS2 selectors (by #id, .class, tag, and [name=value] attributes, with standard child or descendant (>) operators) and nothing more.
trans-unit.target: css2：如果浏览器具有本机选择器引擎，则将使用此选择器，否则将加载一个非常轻量的选择器引擎，该引擎可以执行简单的CSS2选择器（通过＃id，.class，tag和[name = value]属性，带有标准子代或后代（>）运算符），仅此而已。

trans-unit.source: css3: If the browser has a native selector engine with support for CSS3 pseudo selectors (most modern browsers except IE8), this will be used, otherwise the full Acme engine will be loaded.
trans-unit.target: css3.如果浏览器有支持CSS3伪选择器的原生选择器引擎(除IE8外的大多数现代浏览器),将使用这个引擎,否则将加载完整的Acme引擎。如果浏览器有支持CSS3伪选择器的本地选择器引擎(除IE8外的大多数现代浏览器),将使用该引擎,否则将加载完整的Acme引擎。

trans-unit.source: dojo.pushContext treats contexts as a stack. The auto-detected contexts which are initially provided using dojo.setContext() require authors to keep state in order to "return" to a previous context, whereas the dojo.pushContext and dojo.popContext methods provide a more natural way to augment blocks of code to ensure that they execute in a different window or frame without issue. If called without any arguments, the default context (the context when Dojo is first loaded) is instead pushed into the stack. If only a single string is passed, a node in the intitial context's document is looked up and its contextWindow and contextDocument properties are used as the context to push. This means that iframes can be given an ID and code can be executed in the scope of the iframe's document in subsequent calls easily.
trans-unit.target: dojo.pushContext将上下文视为一个堆栈。最初使用dojo.setContext()提供的自动检测的上下文需要作者保持状态以 "返回 "到以前的上下文,而dojo.pushContext和dojo.popContext方法提供了一种更自然的方式来增强代码块,以确保它们在不同的窗口或框架中执行而不会出现问题。如果在没有任何参数的情况下调用,默认的上下文(Dojo第一次加载时的上下文)会被推送到堆栈中。如果只传递一个字符串,则会查找intitial context的文档中的一个节点,并使用其contextWindow和contextDocument属性作为推送的上下文。这意味着可以给iframe一个ID,在后续的调用中可以很容易地在iframe的文档范围内执行代码。

trans-unit.source: dojo.query and XML Documents:
trans-unit.target: dojo.query和XML文档。

trans-unit.source: dojo.query() is the swiss army knife of DOM node manipulation in Dojo. Much like Prototype's "$$" (bling-bling) function or JQuery's "$" function, dojo.query provides robust, high-performance CSS-based node selector support with the option of scoping searches to a particular sub-tree of a document.
trans-unit.target: dojo.query()是Dojo中DOM节点操作的瑞士军刀。就像Prototype的"$$"(bling-bling)函数或JQuery的"$"函数一样,dojo.query提供了强大的、高性能的基于CSS的节点选择器支持,并可将搜索范围扩大到文档的特定子树。
